title: Bug 2120 MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files that were previously opened do not appear in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list when the application is reopened.
EB: The files that were previously opened should appear in the File menu MRU list even after the application is reopened.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application and check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened files are still listed.
